verses.roman:
tapta-vālukāya tomāra pāya haila vraṇa
calite nā pāra, kemane karilā sahana?"

synonyms: tapta-vālukāya—by the hot sand; tomāra—your; pāya—on the soles; haila—there were; vraṇa—blisters; calite nā pāra—you cannot walk; kemane—how; karilā sahana—did you tolerate.
translation: "The hot sand must have blistered your soles. Now you cannot walk. How did you tolerate it?"
